author: Nick Timiraos
title: Fed Minutes to Give Clues on Officials’ View of Economy, Rate Path
text:
The Federal Reserve on Wednesday will offer more details on policy makers’ outlook for 2018 when it releases the minutes of their March 20-21 meeting. Officials voted then to raise their benchmark federal-funds rate by a quarter percentage point to a range between 1.5% and 1.75%.

New projections released after the meeting showed officials...
